name: Soyer au Champagne
description: Gilding the lily is one of my favorite activities, but there was something mildly insane about the thought of putting ice cream in champagne. Were drinkers back in 1888 on to something good?
recipeIngredient: 2 dashes (1/8 tsp) maraschino liqueur such as Luxardo
2 oz champagne or sparkling wine (extra dry, sec, or demi-sec)
garnish: slice of pineapple, slice of orange, slice of lemon, 2 cherries and 2 strawberries

recipeInstructions.text: Scoop the ice cream into a tumbler or cocktail glass.
Add the brandy, curaçao, and maraschino liqueur.
Top with the sparkling wine, garnish and serve.
